mapper.update: update user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wx_openid = #{wxOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, session_key = #{sessionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_time = #{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mark_id = #{markId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, picture, wx_openid, session_key, last_time, mark_id, create_time, update_time from user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, picture, wx_openid, session_key, last_time, mark_id, create_time, update_time from user
